title: Aleph Null
description: Aleph Null is Asia's leading Edtech hub, where student centricity is at the core of everything we do. We exist to democratize AI in education and empower the next generation of learners and learning institutions with services and tools they need to thrive in a rapidly changing world.

title: Kidocode
description: Founded in 2014, Kidocode empowers the next generation of knowledge workers through a personalized, adaptive education system accessible both online and in classrooms. With over 30,000 students, it continues to revolutionize learning by making cutting-edge skills and tools available to all.
